name: Monster Truck Fever Driving
description:
Monster Truck Fever Driving is a physics engine drift truck game.

If you like Simulator Games, Monster Truck,Huge Vehicle and Crushing try it.
Smooth controls, realistic truck physics, realistic truck sound.

Test your real drive skills.

***FEATURES***

* Easy controllers
* Trial Mini World
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* FULL HD graphics with high quality
